column4: the 6.06 docs mention the desktop and server isos, but the mirrors also have an "alternate" edition.  What is this?  the string does not give any results on the website search.
yeah, the alternate is the old textmode CD, it also can do some more stuff, read the blip here (or any of the mirrors): http://mirror.cs.umn.edu/ubuntu-releases/6.06/
